metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13104 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: In Das U-Boot versions 2016.11-rc1 through 2019.07-rc4, an underflow can cause memcpy() to overwrite a very large amount of data (including the whole stack) while reading a crafted ext4 filesystem.

criterions.comment: u-boot package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.04+dfsg-2ubuntu1').
